name: Cyberpunch
description:
Cyberpunch is a Beat 'em up game (also known as brawler) featuring hand-to-hand combat between the protagonist and an improbably large number of opponents.

Cyberpunch is a traditional beat 'em ups take place in scrolling, two-dimensional (2D) levels with numbers of enemies to combat.


Amazing Pixel Art


Cyberpunch take place in urban settings and feature crime-fighting with science fiction and fantasy theme.

In the game, you control Fighters as they travel through environments, clearing the screen of enemies.

Features
  • Amazing graphics fully hand-drawn
  • Pixel Art style game
  • Classic Beat Em Up gameplay
